defaultData.name: Bathroom door at POST is broken
defaultData.description: The bathroom door at POST wont stay closed. I found out the hard way.

defaultData.name: Dorms are on fire
defaultData.description: Someone should check on the dorms. There is for sure a fire going on just sayin.

defaultData.name: Free pizza fridays.
defaultData.description: We should get pizza every friday. My dads paying alot to go here and it isn't right that we dont get free pizza ):
